stripe.title: Stripe Environment
stripe.subtitle: Current payment processing mode
stripe.testModeDescription: Payments are in test mode - no real transactions
stripe.liveModeDescription: ⚠️ LIVE MODE ACTIVE - Processing real payments
stripe.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to switch Stripe to {{mode}} mode?
stripe.warning: This will affect all payment processing across the platform.
stripe.testWarning: Test mode uses test cards and doesn't process real payments.
stripe.liveWarning: LIVE mode processes REAL payments with REAL money. Only activate in production.
stripe.modeUpdatedDescription: Stripe payment processing is now in {{mode}} mode.
stripe.updateFailedDescription: Failed to update Stripe mode. Please try again or update manually.
